website_summaries.verdict: Dual charging station comes with a customer-friendly three-year warranty and lifetime technical support.
pros: Takes no more than three hours to charge each controller with AC adapter via USB port
Design protects against overcharging and battery-related controller damage
Simple, sleek design is easy to fit into most spaces along with other PS4 accessories
cons: Some consumers report missing pieces or accessories, especially the connector tips for the controllers

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It’s wireless!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really amazed at how easy set up and use is! I also had no idea this was a wireless charger when I ordered, but was happily surprised. All you have to do is plug in the little usb and the charger will charge the controller that you set on it. My boyfriend loves it and we no longer have to play with the controller plugged in because we forgot to charge. We keep ours plugged into the ps4 and it works great! Highly recommended for any ps4 gamer, especially for the low price!
